【考法 1】 adj. 悲观的： tending to stress the negative or unfavorable or to take the gloomiest possible view
【例】 With that pessimistic attitude, it's no wonder you're depressed. 你的人生观如此悲观，难怪你会感到压抑
【近】 bearish, defeatist, despairing, downbeat, hopeless
【反】 optimistic 乐观的
【派】 pessimism "worst condition possible,"
【记】 pessimus "worst," originally "bottom-most,"
